mapper.insert: insert into neuedu_shipping (id, user_id, receiver_name, receiver_photo, receiver_mobile, receiver_city, receiver_district, receiver_address, receiver_zip, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update neuedu_shipping set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_photo = #{receiverPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_mobile = #{receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_city = #{receiverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_district = #{receiverDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_address = #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_zip = #{receiverZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, receiver_name, receiver_photo, receiver_mobile, receiver_city, receiver_district, receiver_address, receiver_zip, create_time, update_time from neuedu_shipping where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_id, receiver_name, receiver_photo, receiver_mobile, receiver_city, receiver_district, receiver_address, receiver_zip, create_time, update_time from neuedu_shipping
mapper.delete: delete from neuedu_shipping where user_id=#{userId} and id=#{shippingId}
mapper.update:
update neuedu_shipping
receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_photo = #{receiverPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_mobile = #{receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_city = #{receiverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_district = #{receiverDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_address = #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_zip = #{receiverZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now()
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_id=#{userId}
